content: *berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued directions are still available * *contrasting shades of linen jeans accentuate the undulated pattern of our crocheted headband berroco * materials berroco linen jeans 50 grs 1 hank each #7403 unbleached muslin a and #7432 ganache b crochet hook size 5 00 mm h headband is worked from the long edge
